flawed_nl_solution:
If yesterday the number of buyers was half the number of buyers the day before, then yesterday there were 1/2*50 = <<1/2*50=52>>52 buyers.
Today has 40 more buyers than yesterday, so there were 40+52 = <<40+52=92>>92 buyers today.
The total number of buyers in the store for the three days will be 92+52+50 = <<92+52+50=194>>194 buyers

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
